text: A Rembrandt expert has emerged who has penetrated the secret of his dark background. In that fondness for contrasting black with his large paintings there was something more than a propensity for the dark. They have found themselves in those black artist mysteries of their passion, shadows crouched from their dreams, a watershed of their fears. In that bituminous and overwhelming room of his paintings the fate of his characters and the painter himself was vibrating in the black light. In his Anatomy Lesson, death and his seniority are assumed over the people who make up the painting, protecting the macabre group by the curtain of blackness that pares the background. FIN
title: Las negruras de Rembrandt
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
